sourceSystem.description: The system where the order originated.

dynamicProperties.description: Read-only list of dynamic properties for the order along with meta-data.

id.description: The ID of the dynamic property.

label.description: The label of the dynamic property.

value.description: The value of the dynamic property.

payments.description: Payment details for the order, including additional properties specific to the payment type.

PONumber.description: Purchase order number for invoice payment. Payment type: invoice

amount.description: Amount authorized from the payment group.

balance.description: Total available balance on the gift card.

uiIntervention.description: This decides whether the client has to do some intervention for payment. e.g. SOP.

isAmountRemaining.description: A boolean to decide if more payment can be made from this payment group.

paymentState.description: The state of the payment group. e.g. AUTHORIZED.

submittedDate.description: The order submitted date in ISO format.

uuid.description: The universally unique ID for the order.

organizationId.description: The organization ID, if applicable, for the profile of the order.

secondaryCurrencyTaxAmount.description: The current  total tax amount in monetry currency

secondaryCurrencyShippingAmount.description: The current  total shipping amount in monetry currency

secondaryCurrencyTotal.description: The current  total (sum ofshipping and tax)amount in monetry currency

shippingSurchargeValue.description: Extra handling costs for shipping the products.

taxExclusiveAmount.description: Total excluding shipping and tax in monetary currency

primaryCurrencyTotal.description: The current total in loyalty points in case of multi currency

secondaryCurrencyShippingSurchargeValue.description: Extra handling costs for shipping the products in monetry currency.

items.description: The array of items in the order.

deactivationDate.description: The deactivation date in ISO format.

rawTotalPrice.description: The raw price of the product.

displayName.description: The display name of the product.

dynamicProperties.description: Array of custom properties at order line item level.

id.description: The ID of the dynamic property.

label.description: The label of the dynamic property.

value.description: The value of the dynamic property.

shippingSurchargeValue.description: Extra handling costs for shipping the products.

discountAmount.description: The rdiscount amount for the item.

externalData.description: External data to be associated with a commerce item, provided by a configurator system.

values.description: The array of values associated with an externalData item.

dynamic_property_key.description: This property's name and value will be retrieved from a configurator system, so will be dynamically set.

name.description: The name to be associated with the externalData item.

actionCode.description: The action code that has been set on the externalData item by the configurator system.

billingAccountId.description: The billing account ID associated to the current item.

commerceItemId.description: The unique line item ID distinguisher.

assetId.description: The asset ID corresponding to the current item.

price.description: The actual price of the product.

variant.description: List of variants for the product.

actionCode.description: The action code that has been set on the item by the configurator system.

id.description: The item ID in the order.

serviceId.description: The service ID associated to the current item.

unitPrice.description: The unit price of the product.

serviceAccountId.description: The service account ID associated to the current item.

salePrice.description: The sale price of the product.

remainingQuantity.description: The quantity of the commerce item that is not affected by gift with purchase.

selectedQuantity.description: The quantity of the free gift that this commerce item is making free and was selected by the shopper.

data.description: The gift hash code for this gift with purchase promotion.

automaticQuantity.description: The quantity of the free gift that this commerce item is making free and was auto added by pricing.

value.description: The gift with purchase promotion id.

targetedQuantity.description: The quantity of the free gift that this commerce item is making free and was targeted by pricing.

externalRecurringChargeFrequency.description: The frequency for the recurring charge e.g. Monthly.

externalRecurringChargeDuration.description: The duration for the recurring charge e.g. 12 months.

catRefId.description: The catalog reference ID/SKU ID of the item.

customerAccountId.description: The customer account ID associated to the current item.

promotionName.description: The display name of the promotion.

promotionDesc.description: This field returns name of the promotion. Retained for backward compatibility

giftWithPurchaseChoicesAvailable.description: If this gift with purchase has multiple gift choices.

giftWithPurchaseQuantity.description: The quantity that is gift quantity

giftWithPurchaseIdentifier.description: The gift hash code for this gift with purchase promotion.

amount.description: The monetary amount for the recurring charge.

quantity.description: The number of items covered by this recurring charge price info

detailedUnitPrice.description: The detailed unit price: amount / quantity. (read-only)

currencyCode.description: The three character currency code for the monetary amounts.

shopperInput.description: Map of shopper input keys to values

activationDate.description: The activation date in ISO format.

listPrice.description: The list price of the product.

recurringCharge.description: The recurring charge for the item.

taxPriceInfo.description: The order tax price information details.

secondaryCurrencyTaxAmount.description: The monetary total amount of  tax.

isTaxIncluded.description: Flag that states whether tax is included.

shippingGroup.description: The 1st shipping group for the order.

shippingMethodDescription.description: The shipping method description for the order.

shippingGroups.description: The shipping groups for the order.

taxPriceInfo.description: The shipping tax price info details.

secondaryCurrencyTaxAmount.description: The monetary total amount of  tax.

isTaxIncluded.description: Flag that states whether is tax included.

secondaryCurrencyTaxAmount.description: Shipping tax amount in monetry currency

value.description: The shipping method applied to the order.

shippingMethodDescription.description: The description of the shipping method.

submittedDate.description: The submitted date in ISO format.

secondaryCurrencyTaxAmount.description: The current  total tax amount in monetry currency

secondaryCurrencyShippingAmount.description: The current  total shipping amount in monetry currency

secondaryCurrencyTotal.description: The current  total (sum of shipping and tax)amount in monetry currency

primaryCurrencyTotal.description: The current total in loyalty points in case of multi currency

secondaryCurrencyShippingSurchargeValue.description: Extra handling costs for shipping the products in monetry currency.

amount.description: The monetary amount of this recurring charge.

total.description: The total price of the recurring charge.

frequencyAmountTotals.description: The total for each recurring charge frequency

total.description: The total amount for the frequency.

frequency.description: The frequency for the item's total e.g. Monthly.

subTotal.description: The sub-total price of the recurring charge.

frequencyTaxTotals.description: The tax for each recurring charge frequency

tax.description: The tax amount for the frequency.

frequency.description: The frequency for the item's tax e.g. Monthly.

currencyCode.description: The currency code for the monetary amounts. A three character currency code such as USD.

totalWithoutTax.description: Total of recurring amount without tax included.

secondaryCurrencyShippingDiscount.description: The shipping discount in secondary currency in case of mix currency scenario

discountDescList.description: The list of all the order discounts.

promotionName.description: The display name of the promotion.

promotionDesc.description: This field returns name of the promotion. Retained for backward compatibility

shipOnDate.description: The ship on date in ISO format.

actualShipDate.description: The actual ship date in ISO format.

countryName.description: Country name in the current locale.

items.description: The array of products in the shipping group.

deactivationDate.description: The deactivation date in ISO format.

dynamicProperties.description: Array of custom properties at order line item level.

id.description: The ID of the dynamic property.

label.description: The label of the dynamic property.

value.description: The value of the dynamic property.

externalData.description: External data to be associated with a commerce item, provided by a configurator system.

values.description: The array of values associated with an externalData item.

dynamic_property_key.description: This property's name and value will be retrieved from a configurator system, so will be dynamically set.

name.description: The name to be associated with the externalData item.

actionCode.description: The action code that has been set on the externalData item by the configurator system.

billingAccountId.description: The billing account ID associated to the current item.

assetId.description: The asset ID corresponding to the current item.

variant.description: List of variants for the product.

onSale.description: Indicates whether the price is for an item that is on sale.

actionCode.description: The action code that has been set on the item by the configurator system.

serviceId.description: The service ID associated to the current item.

serviceAccountId.description: The service account ID associated to the current item.

quantity.description: The quantity of the product in this shipping group.

productId.description: ID of the product in the cart.

externalRecurringChargeFrequency.description: The frequency for the recurring charge e.g. Monthly.

externalRecurringChargeDuration.description: The duration for the recurring charge e.g. 12 months.

customerAccountId.description: The customer account ID associated to the current item.

amount.description: The monetary amount for the recurring charge.

quantity.description: The number of items covered by this recurring charge price info

detailedUnitPrice.description: The detailed unit price: amount / quantity. (read-only)

currencyCode.description: The three character currency code for the monetary amounts.

activationDate.description: The activation date in ISO format.

recurringCharge.description: The recurring charge for the item.

lastModifiedDate.description: The date the order was last modified in ISO format.

shippingMethod.description: The 1st shipping group method details for the order.

secondaryCurrencyTaxAmount.description: Shipping tax amount in monetry currency

shippingTax.description: The shipping tax for the order.

value.description: The shipping method ID for the order.

priceListGroup.description: The order price list group details.

deleted.description: Property to determine existence of the price list group.

displayName.description: Display name of the price list group.

repositoryId.description: Repository ID of the list price list.
Repository ID of the price list group.

active.description: Active status of the price list group.

repositoryId.description: Repository ID of the sale price list.

fractionalDigits.description: Number of fractional digits for the currency.

id.description: ID of the price list group.

locale.description: Locale of the price list group.

repositoryId.description: Repository ID of the shipping surcharge price list.

creationDate.description: The creation date in ISO format.

amount.description: The monetary amount of this recurring charge.

total.description: The total price of the recurring charge.

frequencyAmountTotals.description: The total for each recurring charge frequency

total.description: The total amount for the frequency.

frequency.description: The frequency for the item's total e.g. Monthly.

subTotal.description: The sub-total price of the recurring charge.

frequencyTaxTotals.description: The tax for each recurring charge frequency

tax.description: The tax amount for the frequency.

frequency.description: The frequency for the item's tax e.g. Monthly.

currencyCode.description: The currency code for the monetary amounts. A three character currency code such as USD.

totalWithoutTax.description: Total of recurring amount without tax included.

discountDescList.description: The list of all the order discounts.

promotionName.description: The display name of the promotion.

promotionDesc.description: This field returns name of the promotion. Retained for backward compatibility

giftWithPurchaseType.description: The type of the gift. (sku, product)

giftWithPurchaseDetail.description: String identifying the free gift, usually the repository id of the gift type.

promotionId.description: The gift with purchase promotion id

giftWithPurchaseIdentifier.description: An identifier used to track which gift selection in the promotion this is.  It allows the commerce item marker to link to this one.

orderLocale.description: The locale when the order was submitted.

giftWithPurchaseOrderMarkers.description: gift with purchase order marker information

quantity.description: The total quantity of sku for this gift selection.

selectedQuantity.description: The quantity of free sku for this gift selection that has already been selected by the Shopper and added to the order.

removedQuantity.description: The amount of free quantity that has since been manually removed by a Shopper.

data.description: Gift hash code to track which gift selection in the promotion this is.  It allows the commerce item marker to link to this one.

autoRemove.description: Flag to indicate whether free gifts should be auto removed if the promotion no longer qualifies.

giftDetail.description: String identifying the free gift, usually the repository id of the gift type.

automaticQuantity.description: The quantity of free sku for this gift selection that has already been auto added to the order.

giftType.description: The type of the gift. (sku, product)

failedQuantity.description: The amount of automatic free quantity that failed to be added to the cart due to some pricing error, e.g. invalid site.

value.description: The gift with purchase promotion id

targetedQuantity.description: The quantity of free sku for this gift selection that has already been targeted and made free by the calculator in the order.
